headline: North America Adds More Rigs Week on Week
summary: North America added nine rigs week on week, according to Baker Hughes' latest North America rotary rig count.

headline: Energy Is Taking a Hit Today. Oil Prices Are Lower.
summary: Oil prices and energy-related stocks were down across the board on Monday morning.  WTI crude prices, the U.S. benchmark, are down 0.1% today to $64.27 a barrel.  The S&P 500 energy sector is the biggest loser of the day so far, down 1.1%.
